mapper.select: select exchanges.*, orders.order_num, exchange_status.exchange_status_name, exchange_reason.exchange_reason_name from exchanges inner join orders on exchanges.order_num = orders.order_num inner join exchange_status on exchange_status.exchange_status_code = exchanges.exchange_status_code inner join exchange_reason on exchange_reason.exchange_reason_code = exchanges.exchange_reason_code where exchanges.order_num = #{orderNum} order by exchanges.order_num

select exchanges.*, orders.user_id, exchange_reasons.exchange_reason_name, exchange_status.exchange_status_name from exchanges inner join orders on exchanges.order_num = orders.order_num inner join exchange_reasons on exchange_reasons.exchange_reason_code = exchanges.exchange_reason_code inner join exchange_status on exchange_status.exchange_status_code = exchanges.exchange_status_code order by exchange_num

select mealkits.mealkit_name from exchanges inner join orders on exchanges.order_num = orders.order_num inner join orders_mealkits on orders_mealkits.order_num = orders.order_num inner join mealkits on mealkits.mealkit_num = orders_mealkits.mealkit_num where exchanges.exchange_num = #{exchangeNum}
mapper.insert: insert into exchanges(exchange_num, exchange_img_file_name, exchange_content, exchange_reason_name, exchange_status_name, order_num) values(exchange_num_seq.nextval, #{exchangeImgFileName}, #{exchangeContent}, #{exchangeReasonName}, #{exchangeStatusName}, #{orderNum})
